Yes, you have to sudo -H -s before you run the installer.
first chmod a+x to your .run file, and then ./filename.run
and I would sudo -H -s when you do it
when you chmod you do not do ./
you only "./" when you run the file ;)
do not use "./| for changemod
chmod with NO ./
exactly like this - chmod a+x Postal2Demo.run
./Postal2Demo.run
Your welcome, remember chmod a+x for binarys, and ONLY use ./ when you run the file - no ./ when you chmod a+x, simply the filename.
